boardgame.name: CV
CV -履歴書-
CV人生規劃
boardgame.description: Have you ever wondered who you would have been if your life had gone differently? How would you direct your life if everything were up to you? Maybe you would be a magician, or travel around the world? Or maybe big business tempts you, and your goal would be to earn a million dollars?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;CV_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; means curriculum vitae _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; your resume _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and in the dice and card game CV you will lead a character through his entire life, making many choices about friends, relations, jobs and activities. Everything is possible: a dream job, new relationships and skills. You can be whoever you want!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay is built around the Yahtzee-style dice rolling and re-rolling system. On their dice, players are trying to roll sets of symbols that allow them to acquire cards; each round these cards give benefits of some kind, such as new symbols and special abilities. At the end of the game, each kind of card scores points for the player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Episode 98 - Heroes of Land, Air _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Sea
The Game Pit: Episode 40 - Council Chamber Mega Review of 2014 with Top 5s
The Good, The Board and the Salty about some Germans: Episode 17 “Spiel Des Jahres”

Game: CV (Granna) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de

Entertaining take on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;game of life_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;: players use dice and cards to create their own curriculum vitae. Players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; scores come from the public goals and their own secret goal. Great fun. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £16.67 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £3.13 (myHermes, takes 3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £10.02 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £8.35 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £14.00 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £13.05 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)

Passport Game Studios (PGS111) Ever wanted to reset the clock? Now_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your chance! Have you ever wondered who you would have been if your life had gone differently? How would you direct your life if everything were up to you? Would you be a world traveler, a magician...or just a lazy bum? CV means curriculum vitae - your resume - and in the dice and card game CV you will lead a character through his entire life, making many choices about friends, relations, jobs and activities. Everything is possible: a dream job, new relationships and skills. You can be whoever you want! Gameplay is built around the Yahtzee-style dice rolling and re-rolling system. On their dice, players are trying to roll sets of symbols that allow them to acquire cards; each round these cards give benefits of some kind, such as new symbols and special abilities. At the end of the game, each kind of card scores points for the player.
Perfect condition. Only played a few times. Hard to find.
Will discount shipping on multiple games purchased from my list
